Name: Landmarks, Claremont House: 1640 Anthony Avenue, Article XI, Bronx (G 250083 XAX).
Title: Application number G 250083 XAX (Claremont House: 1640 Anthony Avenue, Article XI) submitted by the Department of Housing Preservation and Development, pursuant to Section 577 of the Private Housing Finance Law, requesting approval of an exemption from real property taxation for property located at 1640 Anthony Avenue (Block 2888, Lot 23), Borough of the Bronx, Community District 4, Council District 15.
BodyName: Subcommittee on Landmarks, Public Sitings and Dispositions

History.Description: This Land Use Application was Introduced by Council
